com.microsoft.tfs.core.clients.versioncontrol.localworkspace
Interface PathWatcherFactory

public interface PathWatcherFactory

A factory for PathWatchers.

Thread-safety:
thread-safe

Method Summary
 PathWatcher newPathWatcher(java.lang.String path, WorkspaceWatcher watcher)
          Gets a new PathWatcher that watches for filesystem changes at the specified directory and in all subdirectories.
 

Method Detail

newPathWatcher

PathWatcher newPathWatcher(java.lang.String path,
                           WorkspaceWatcher watcher)
Gets a new PathWatcher that watches for filesystem changes at the specified directory and in all subdirectories.

Parameters:
path - the local directory path to watch for changes (must not be null)
watcher - the WorkspaceWatcher that the new PathWatcher will work for. The PathWatcher may notify the LocalWorkspaceScanner directly of changes it detects.
Returns:
a new PathWatcher (never null)
